content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** simplifies the process of locating watermarks within business documents. Install our package into your {{EnvName}} applications to take advantage of its benefits.
content.step_1: To utilize our library features, load the {{FileformatCap}} file into an instance of the **Watermarker** class. You can provide a file path, file stream, or byte stream.
content.step_2: To narrow down the list of potential watermarks, utilize the **SearchCriteria** object. For example, provide an image to search for similar image watermarks. If searching for textual watermarks, provide text, font, color, and other relevant options.
content.step_3: Retrieve watermarks placed within the document using the **Search** method of the **Watermarker** object. You will receive a collection of objects representing potential watermarks for further processing.
content.step_4: Finally, you have the freedom to manipulate the search results as needed. You can delete found watermarks or edit their properties, such as changing size or text.

more_features.title: Deep dive into adding Watermark
more_features.description: API to render, display, convert documents, slides, diagrams, and many other document types in .NET applications

feature_1.title: Watermark your documents easily.
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} makes it easy for {{EnvName}} developers to add various types of watermarks in popular business documents and files.

feature_2.title: Customize watermarks for your goals.
feature_2.content: Our solution supports many watermark features. You can easily adjust size, rotation, color, font, font styles and other options to make watermark looks perfect.

feature_3.title: Use native document objects
feature_3.content: Accordingly do particular document format it is possible to use native document features. Native PDF annotations or MS Word page watermark may be used for watermarking.

code_1.title: Search in PDF attachments
code_1.content: This example shows how to search for all the images attachments in a PDF document

head.title: Discover {{FileFormatUp}} Watermark Search: A Game Changer
head.description: Uncover the game-changing potential of G{{ProdFullName}} advanced search features for managing watermarks in various document types.

header.title: Maximize Efficiency with {{FileFormatUp}} Documents Watermark Search
header.description: Optimize your workflow efficiency with {{ProdFullName}} innovative watermark search capabilities.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Get info {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: {{ProdFullName}} provides a robust solution for watermark management using {{EnvName}}. Developers can effortlessly create, edit, search, and remove watermarks from documents in popular file formats. It supports both text and image watermarks across various document types, including PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, email, and image formats. {{ProdFullName}} seamlessly integrates with all major operating systems and {{EnvName}} versions.

formats.title: Empower Your Workflow with Watermark Search
formats.description: Empower yourself to search and manage watermarks across different file formats with {{ProdFullName}} advanced capabilities.
